definitions.definition: One who has been captured or is otherwise confined .
One charmed or subdued by beauty, excellence, or affection; one who is captivated.
A captive insurance company , a subsidiary of a company used as its internal insurer .

main_definition: One who has been captured or is otherwise confined .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) One charmed or subdued by beauty, excellence, or affection; one who is captivated.
A captive insurance company , a subsidiary of a company used as its internal insurer .
